headline: Citizens Launches Ninth Annual Small Business Community Champion Award Contest
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., January 20, 2026--Small businesses across the country will continue to have the opportunity to access critical funding and professional support as Citizens announced today the opening of its ninth annual Small Business Community Champion Award Contest. The program is designed to recognize and empower the business owners whose work strengthens neighborhoods and drives economic growth.

headline: Did Citizens’ 2025 Outlook of Higher NII and Expenses Just Shift CFG’s Investment Narrative?
summary: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. recently reported its fourth-quarter and 2025 results, following earlier guidance that pointed to higher earnings and revenues supported by growing net interest income and a solid lending backdrop. With management outlining expectations for net interest income and non-interest income growth alongside higher expenses, the latest update highlights how Citizens is balancing expansion with cost control in a still-competitive regional banking landscape. With...

headline: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) To Report Earnings Tomorrow: Here Is What To Expect
summary: Regional banking company Citizens Financial Group (NYSE:CFG) will be reporting earnings this Wednesday morning. Here’s what to look for.
